/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the surroundings. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene. In the distance, a red and white train can be seen, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise tranquil setting. The image is a beautiful representation of the blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
